General.Name: Transimex Saigon Corp
General.Description: Transimex Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, provides logistics services in Vietnam and internationally. It offers international freight forwarding services, including full container load/less than container load; international and domestic door-to-door transport services; air freight services; logistics solutions, project cargo, and exhibition displays; and carriage, and packing and customs clearance services. The company also provides warehousing and distribution services; inland trucking; contract and total logistics; shipping agency; and container barging services. In addition, it offers ICD operator services; and leases office buildings. Further, the company provides cargo transportation and handling; coastal and sea freight; storage of goods; packaging; inland waterway transportation; real estate; house and building cleaning; landscape caring; other passenger land transport; and other valued added services, as well as acts as an air ticket agent. Additionally, it engages in machinery and equipment rental; office equipment delivery; and apartment buildings and other dwellings businesses. Transimex Corporation was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam.
